So when you’re planning a business meeting or event, or looking for a wedding venue in London, look no further than Thistle Euston. You can choose from a wide range of refreshments, including healthy options, and make use of our Brasserie 43 Restaurant, Westminster Lounge & Bar and 43 Bar. And whether you’re planning a board meeting or a birthday bash, our dedicated Meetings & Events team will help you from start to finish.  Mix business with pleasure All our meeting rooms come fully equipped with • Air-conditioning • LCD projector and screen • Superfast free BT Wi-Fi internet access   Our largest function room, the Winchester, seats up to 90 people theatre-style, making it suitable for press conferences and product launches: it’s also an ideal wedding venue, especially if you have guests travelling into London from elsewhere. We have five further meeting rooms suitable for board and team meetings, training sessions, presentations, interviews and private dining. Located just 200m metres from London Euston station, and a short walk from the Eurostar terminal at
